definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Americans continue to debate how to interpret the Second Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 美國人爲如何解釋第二修正案繼續辯論。

sentences.english: There are two religion clauses in the First Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 《第一條修正案》裏有兩條關於宗教的條款。

sentences.english: Bugfix related to optimizing Far-field data including surface-wave.
sentences.chinese: 修正了相關的優化遠場數據，包括地面波。

sentences.english: The modified calculation about cable's angle and force of Gonghe bridge is done.
sentences.chinese: 對公和橋拉索的索力和傾角進行了垂度修正計算。

sentences.english: If we have abnormalities in practice, we will be amended .
sentences.chinese: 如果我們在作法上有異常情況，我們將會修正。

sentences.english: At last, the approach is supplemented according to the value leakage.
sentences.chinese: 最後針對價值漏損隨實物期權的定價進行修正。

sentences.english: The results of the isotropic model are better than that of modified Cam-clay.
sentences.chinese: 對比計算結果說明各向同性模型優於修正劍橋模型。

sentences.english: Your code can guide you to fixes that are cheap and light.
sentences.chinese: 代碼可以引導你找到那些又便宜又輕便的修正方法。

sentences.english: Has the devious Beijing government been massaging the numbers, as communist planners are wont to do?
sentences.chinese: 是朝令夕改的北京政府像往常一樣在修正數據嗎？

sentences.english: First of all, the teaching target needs to be corrected and reoriented .
sentences.chinese: 首先，要修正教學目標，要重新定位，還原魯迅。

sentences.english: Probe errors analysis and correction are the key technique in time domain near field measurement.
sentences.chinese: 探頭誤差分析和修正是時域近場測量中的關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Estimate revisions have a larger impact on earnings than do method changes.
sentences.chinese: 預估修正對收入的影響比之改變方法要大得多。

sentences.english: Fixed an issue where sequences with an activity weight of 0 never get selected.
sentences.chinese: 修正了一個問題，即與一0活動從來沒有選擇權序列。

sentences.english: Feed and dressing movements are controled by means of two independent driving systems.
sentences.chinese: 機牀的進給及修正，由二個互不干涉的傳動機構執行。

sentences.english: It is a correction that becomes a chance that she obtains Kokoro.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個修正使她擁有“心”的機會。

sentences.english: Weighing mechanism shall be temperature compensating and shall have automatic dampener to reduce oscillations.
sentences.chinese: 稱重的機械裝置應有溫度修正和自動潤滑以減少震動。

definition: to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
